password_invalid: Minimum eight characters, one lowercase letter and one number is required for a password.
new_password_invalid: New Password is not valid, Minimum eight characters, one lowercase letter and one number is required for it.
something_went_wrong: Oops, Something went wrong please try again later.
email_empty: Email id field can't be empty
first_name_empty: First name field can't be empty
last_name_empty: Last name field can't be empty
confirm_pass_empty: Confirm password field can't be empty
first_name_invalid: Invalid first name, it can't contain any number or special character(s)
last_name_invalid: Invalid last name, it can't contain any number or special character(s)
double_tap_exit: If you go back you will quit the setup process. Press back again to exit.
new_old_same: New password cannot be the same as old password
pass_same: Password and confirm password must match
pass_match: New password and confirm password don't match
old_pass: Old password field can't be empty
sure_to_logout: Are you sure you want to logout.
session_expired: It seems your session has timed our or expired, please login again
forgot_pass_text: Please enter your registered username to receive reset link or email.
mark_complete: Are you sure you want to mark this video as completed?
choose_pic: Please select camera or Gallery to capture image.
invite_label: Please enter email of person you want to invite
great_work: Great work! You have successfully worked
view_all_favourites: View all Favorites under History > Favorites.
no_videos_month: No videos found for this month.
accept_terms: Please accept the terms and condition & privacy policy.
purchase_message: You cannot purchase this month before unlock date.
sure_purchase: Are you sure you want to purchase this month
sure_purchase_video: Are you sure you want to purchase this video
sure_disable_notification: Are you sure you want to disable all notifications for App.
empty_insta: Instagram url field cannot be empty.
